name: Vertical Third Tech Demo (Unreal Engine 5)
description:
Vertical Third is the recipient of an Epic MegaGrant. More information is available at www.VerticalThird.com.

This is a tech demo showcasing many of the technical features of Vertical Third for Unreal Engine 5. For a full list of features and to purchase, check out the Unreal Engine Marketplace page here:

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/verticalthird

This tech demo takes the example game included in Vertical Third and is modified with a Patcher, Launcher and Cloud Integration. Many aspects of this example game can be modified through the No Code Workflow by modifying DataTables. Perspective and other gameplayer options are available in the Game Options Menu (Esc).

You can play singleplayer, create/join listen servers on LAN and connect online to a dedicated server in the cloud.

All demo games are for evaluation purposes of Vertical Third only.
